testcase.name: test_emulator_initialization
testcase.failure: tests/integration/test_hardware_emulation.py:190: in test_emulator_initialization assert "gyroscope" in esp32s3_emulator.config["sensor_types"] E KeyError: 'sensor_types'

testcase.name: test_emulator_start_stop
testcase.failure: tests/integration/test_hardware_emulation.py:201: in test_emulator_start_stop assert emulator.status == "stopped" E AttributeError: 'HardwareEmulator' object has no attribute 'status'

testcase.name: test_tcp_connection_establishment
testcase.failure: tests/integration/test_hardware_emulation.py:225: in test_tcp_connection_establishment assert emulator.connected_clients >= 1 E AttributeError: 'HardwareEmulator' object has no attribute 'connected_clients'
